channel.title: Glitch?
channel.description: I thought I fixed this but I guess I didn't... I have SOOOOO many questions about shops... Okay, In my PKP shop I would check hm something costs and it would show the PRICE of the item in GP but it's in a PKP shop. So I'd spawn gp and try and buy but it says I don't have enough Tokkul. Wtf..? And I just type in ::shop 31 too see the shop. I don't even know where the god damn NPC is that hosts that shop... Next, I have an NPC I made for A PK shop.. he's not in my shops.cfg but whenever I click on him it shows in the game screen hm pkp i have... along with Duradel.. I trade with him and it shows info on how much Slayer Points I have. Duradel's not in shops.cfg either... So if he isn't in shops.cfg how would I add him in there and add items into the shop .. along with my PKP NPC and his items I want in there. My shops are so fucked up. Someone show me or tell me what to do.. this is so stressful..

item.title: Glitch?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Free Sosa, post:3, topic:511774”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=630019.msg4271737#msg4271737 date=1364586074]
You need to add the items to the special price area…
[/quote]
Where’s that at?[/quote]
Not in the shop handler or anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Free_Sosa Free Sosa
item.description:
@Free_Sosa wrote:

I thought I fixed this but I guess I didn’t…
I have SOOOOO many questions about shops…
Okay, In my PKP shop I would check hm something costs and it would show the PRICE of the item in GP
but it’s in a PKP shop. So I’d spawn gp and try and buy but it says I don’t have enough Tokkul. Wtf…? And I just type in ::shop 31 too see the shop. I don’t even know where the god damn NPC is that hosts that shop… Next, I have an NPC I made for A PK shop… he’s not in my shops.cfg but whenever I click on him it shows in the game screen hm pkp i have… along with Duradel… I trade with him and it shows info on how much Slayer Points I have. Duradel’s not in shops.cfg either… So if he isn’t in shops.cfg how would I add him in there and add items into the shop … along with my PKP NPC and his items I want in there. My shops are so fucked up. Someone show me or tell me what to do… this is so stressful…

Read full topic
